 010:     a product of two functions.
 011: 
 012:     Parameters
 013:     ----------
 014:     fun1 : complex 2d ndarray

 020:     dx : double
 021:         Grid spacing, i.e. L/N.
 022:     
 023:     Notes
 024:     -----
 025:     The function does not check whether the arrays have the same size or if that dimension is the same as N. That should be done
 026:     somewhere else.

 073:     """ The value of a basis function indexed by n1,n2 at point x1,x2.
 074: 
 075:     Parameters
 076:     ----------
 077:     x1 : double
